item.title: Building User Interfaces with R's Shiny
item.description: Introduction Admittedly, it has been a long time since my last blog entry. Between that time, I have been working on a number of projects that I maintain over at my GitHub and more importantly, I was working on my final year thesis and finalizing my undergraduate studies. I have also been reading a few programming books, more recently deciding to delve into shiny app development after a brief tour of Mastering Shiny.
